ygData.subject: Re: crazy lag
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep got bad lag in North Ro yeserday while camping Dervs. I got disconetced too and could not het on until an hour later. Luckely my party was still there. We
ygData.messageBody:
Yep got bad lag in North Ro yeserday while
camping Dervs. I got disconetced too and could not het on
until an hour later. Luckely my party was still there.
We did lose another member and I feel bad about that
becaus eit was his first time in Ro and on top of that
he's a blind human. Hope someone will help him get out
if he logs back on.<br><br>I also noticed that SK
are better in a group then I thought. Taunting skill
is at 65 for me and words quite well most of the
time and if that doesn't work I cast dissiease cloud.
One hell of a taunt.. put's ya right on top of a
Mob's agro list and if hunting several enemies at a
time it sometimes makes everyone turn on you. But
having a good healer is absolutly cool in that
matter.<br><br>Often I would concentrate on the casters while a druid
whatched my back. And healed me when I got further then to
bubbles of health down. The others would get the rest and
I'd join them asap. We rocked again. Having a group
that knows what it is doing is great. When we got a
thug we rooted or snard him and had two tanks on him
and got him down very fast everytime.<br>I love being
in a good group. But because of the lag and a bummer
headache I called it a night. To bad because I got very
good xp on dervs I'm half a bubble from 12. And I want
my meditate skill!<br><br>Good hunting all!
